sys_remote_update_set.description:
Add additional granularity to the general request option to allow for better direction of general request if customer knows the area of which the request should be focused.
Could we modify the generic request with a few drop down options so it can be routed to the right team: - Networking - 'VA - Network Engineering' - Monitoring - 'VA - Mon Automation' - Storage - 'VA - Storage Management' - Backups - 'VA - Storage Management' - OS Engineering (Windows) WDC - 'VA - WDC Windows Infrastructure Support' - OS Engineering (Windows) EDC - 'VA - Operating Systems Windows' - OS Engineering (Unix) - 'VA - Operating Systems Unix' - Virtual - 'VA - Virtualization - Infrastructure' - Data center operations - 'VA - Data Center Operations' - Help desk (Default) - Security - 'VA - Security Support' Based on what they select the request can be placed in the corresponding groups' queue. This will help while we build out our full catalog
sys_remote_update_set.name: GD - 2015-10-06 - updateSR - GenericRequest
